body:
Add a workflow how to use spack on Travis-CI.

### Future Work

depending if and how we can simplify #5101: add a multi-compiler, multi-C++-standard, multi-software
build matrix example. (Looking at you, https://github.com/travis-ci/travis-ci/issues/5959 👀 )

update from yesterdays discussion: the new [binary repos](https://github.com/LLNL/spack/pull/4854) can also help a lot here.
title: Docs: Travis-CI Workflow
